data.name: Raining Coins
data.detailed_description:
It's raining gold coins! Come, play & catch them! (4K@120FPS)

Help little Eve catch the gold coins!
The skies have opened up but it’s not raining cats and dogs! It’s raining gold coins!
Help poor Eve catch the gold coins and buy the toys she loves. 4K super addictive family game fun for kids, teenagers and grownups.

  • Remastered 4K@120FPS.
  • Designed for family and small kids.
  • Super cute graphics & characters.
  • 4 worlds & 80 exciting rounds to play.
  • Dress Eve up with skirts, costumes and accessories!
  • Get help if you need it.

data.short_description: It's raining gold coins! Come, play & catch them! (4K@120FPS)
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
data.reviews:
“CrazySoft has done it again! This time they made a super addicting casual physics game packed with many rounds. Everybody should try this!”
5/5 – Phonesnews

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX 12
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse is needed
